page.title: 20Road safety near our school
page.content: Now that the{M25}has been opened the main road along the front of the school has become dangerous.It's become dangerous because before the motorway was opened there was heavy traffic,now traffic just zooms along breaking the speed limit.There is a bridge and a set of traffic lights but people just run across the road.The Council might be planning to pull the bridge down and that means children who have to cross on the bridge wont use the traffic lights and just run across the road.The speed the cars travel at a child could be killed instantly.I think the motorway is a good idea but they{could}make the roads a bit safer.
